author: wtopstaff
title: Hornets-Magic, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 3, 2015 9:42 pm CHARLOTTE (106) 
Kidd-Gilchrist 2-4 0-0 4, M.Williams 3-6 0-0 9, Jefferson 2-4 0-0 4, Walker 3-9 6-7 13, Batum 5-12 3-5 14, Lamb 5-10 4-4 16, Zeller 3-3 4-9 10, Hawes 1-5 2-2 4, Lin 5-10 5-6 17, Hairston 2-5 2-2 8, Roberts 0-1 0-0 0, Kaminsky 3-6 0-0 7. Totals 34-75 26-35 106. ORLANDO (100) 
Harris 4-5 0-0 9, Frye 0-5 2-2 2, Dedmon 0-2 2-2 2, Payton 3-7 0-0 6, Oladipo 6-8 3-3 16, Hezonja 4-6 0-0 9, Watson 2-10 0-1 5, Smith 4-8 2-2 10, Nicholson 9-14 3-4 23, Marble 2-9 2-3 6, Egwu 0-0 0-0 0, Ejim 3-8 0-0 6, Napier 1-4 0-0 2, Sibert 0-1 0-0 0, Appling 1-2 2-2 4. Totals 39-89 16-19 100. Charlotte 24 24 37 21—106 Orlando 29 22 25 24—100 
3-Point Goals_Charlotte 12-31 (M.Williams 3-6, Lamb 2-4, Lin 2-4, Hairston 2-4, Kaminsky 1-2, Batum 1-3, Walker 1-4, Kidd-Gilchrist 0-1, Jefferson 0-1, Hawes 0-2), Orlando 6-26 (Nicholson 2-3, Harris 1-2, Oladipo 1-2, Hezonja 1-2, Watson 1-5, Napier 0-1, Payton 0-1, Ejim 0-2, Frye 0-3, Marble 0-5). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_Charlotte 52 (Jefferson 9), Orlando 51 (Nicholson 8). Assists_Charlotte 30 (Walker 8), Orlando 22 (Watson 5). Total Fouls_Charlotte 15, Orlando 30. A_14,942 (18,500).
